/* board-mapper.xml(selectBoardList) */
SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_USER, BOARD_NM, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REG_DT, BOARD_MOD_DT, BOARD_DEL_DT, BOARD_VIEW, BOARD_COMMENT, BOARD_LIKES FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC
mapper.insert: /* board-mapper.xml(uploadBoard) */ INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_USER, BOARD_NM, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REG_DT, BOARD_MOD_DT, BOARD_DEL_DT, BOARD_VIEW, BOARD_COMMENT, BOARD_LIKES ) VALUES ( #{boardUser}, #{boardNm}, #{boardContent}, now(), NULL, NULL, '0', '0', '0' )
mapper.select: /* board-mapper.xml(getBoardDetail) */ SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_USER, BOARD_NM, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REG_DT, BOARD_MOD_DT, BOARD_DEL_DT, BOARD_VIEW, BOARD_COMMENT, BOARD_LIKES FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: update board SET BOARD_NM = #{boardNm}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, BOARD_MOD_DT = now() WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId};
mapper.insert: /* board-mapper.xml(uploadBoard) */ INSERT INTO COMMENT ( COMMENT_UPPER, COMMENT_PARENT, COMMENT_DEPTH, COMMENT_ORDER, COMMENT_USER, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_REG_DT, COMMENT_MOD_DT, COMMENT_DEL_DT ) VALUES ( #{commentUpper}, 0, 0, 0, #{commentUser}, #{commentContent}, now(), NULL, NULL )
